document.full_text: a suicide bomber killed 24 people in pakistan on thursday in the latest militant attack since the death of osama bin laden which has angered pakistan and led to a call for the united states to withdraw some of its military trainers.
document.title: bomber kills 24 in pakistan; u.s. military mission trimmed
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber killed 24 people in pakistan on thursday in the latest militant attack since the death of osama bin laden which has angered pakistan and led to a call for the united states to withdraw some of its military trainers.
